nodes.text: A utility vibroblade was a style of vibroblade. The Rodian Tsoklo, an informant for the Galactic Empire on the planet Lothal, owned a utility vibroblade, which he kept as a weapon about five years before the Battle of Yavin, around the Lothal Year of 3272.

Utility vibroblades were first mentioned in the 2014 reference book Star Wars Rebels: Head to Head, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo. In a theoretical showdown between Tsoklo and Supply Master Yogar Lyste, the latter attempts to arrest the former for hoarding grain. Out of desperation, Tsoklo pulls his utility vibroblade, but ultimately surrenders himself to the Empire without a fight.
